name: Ratatouille - Culinary Rush
description:
Welcome to Ratatouille: Culinary Rush, a first-person game where you play as Remy the rat inside the kitchen. Your job? Make sure Ego is satisfied.

Inspired by the movie of the same name "Ratatouille" created by Pixar, you'll be invited to explore the kitchen in this exploration and platform game, create the recipe asked, and make sure you don't end up burning your paws!

And in the end, see if Ego is happy with what you made by seeing your Highscore, if he is not, why not try again?

[Game in french for a jury in University - ECV Lille - France - 2nd Year - Also our real first game]

Pauline Boulant : 2D assets/Texturing/Sound Design

Gemma "Solya" Lelli : Project Manager - Game Designer - Level Designer - Programmation - Lighting Artist

Antoine Defert : 3D artist (specialized in architecture and big props)

Tifaine Plisson : 3D artist (specialized in small props)

Quentin Fert : Voice Actor (As Ego)
